features.title: Powerful Features for Modern Accounting
features.subtitle: Automate your accounting and streamline your workflows with seamless AI-powered automation.

automatedAccounting.title: Automated Accounting
automatedAccounting.description: Save days of manual work every month with 90%+ of journal entries booked automatically. Extract data from invoices, create transactions, and reconcile accounts seamlessly.

aiCopilot.title: AI Copilot
aiCopilot.description: Ask any question about your financial data using natural language. Generate custom reports, analyze trends, and get insights from your transactions and documents.

accountsPayable.title: Accounts Payable Automation
accountsPayable.description: Process invoices via email, upload individually or in bulk - supporting all languages and formats. From scanned PDFs to eInvoices and PEPPOL.

bankReconciliation.title: Bank Reconciliation
bankReconciliation.description: Automatically match invoices to bank payments using intelligent pattern recognition. Achieve 95%+ automation in your reconciliation process.

duplicateDetection.title: Duplicate & Anomaly Detection
duplicateDetection.description: Protect your business with advanced pattern recognition that identifies duplicates and anomalies. Detect potential fraud and errors before they impact your financials.

approvalWorkflows.title: Approval Workflows
approvalWorkflows.description: Design custom approval chains with multi-level authorization and role-based routing. Approve on-the-go with mobile support.

accountsReceivable.title: Accounts Receivable Management
accountsReceivable.description: Create professional invoices, automate payment reminders, and track outstanding balances. Set up recurring invoices with smart scheduling and payment tracking.

insightsAnalytics.title: Insights & Analytics
insightsAnalytics.description: Get instant visibility into cash flow, expenses, and revenue trends with dynamic dashboards. Create automatic summaries and financial insights tailored to your business.

documentManagement.title: Smart Document Management
documentManagement.description: Upload and organize all business documents - contracts, receipts, bank statements, and more. Extract key information automatically and make everything searchable by content.

periodClosing.title: Period Closing Automation
periodClosing.description: Streamline month-end and year-end processes with automated checklists and workflows. Handle prepaid expenses, accruals, and deferred revenue with intelligent period allocation.

apiIntegration.title: Enterprise API Integration
apiIntegration.description: Connect seamlessly with any ERP, HR system, or business application via our OpenAPI-compliant interface. Build custom integrations and automate data flows across your systems.

compliance.title: Compliance & Audit Trail
compliance.description: Track every action with comprehensive audit logs showing who did what and when. Ensure compliance with automated controls and real-time monitoring.

userManagement.title: User Management & RBAC
userManagement.description: Granular role-based access control with customizable permissions. Manage user roles, departments, and access levels. Implement multi-factor authentication and session management.

accountants.title: Accountants
accountants.description: End-to-end automation, intelligent data entry, and compliance tools

financeTeam.title: Finance Team & Executive Management
financeTeam.description: Real-time insights, AI-powered Copilot, and strategic dashboards

auditors.title: Auditors
auditors.description: Complete audit trails, compliance reporting, and anomaly detection
